titles.title: Border Smog Reduction Accountability Act
To provide for reimbursing the States for the cost incurred by the States in implementing the Border Smog Reduction Act of 1998.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and Environment.

term.name: Federal aid to air pollution control

bill.summary: 5/11/1999--Introduced. Border Smog Reduction Accountability Act - Requires the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency, out of amounts appropriated for carrying out the Clean Air Act, to make grants to States in amounts sufficient to reimburse States for costs incurred in implementing the Border Smog Reduction Act of 1998.
